vsParam: Humph... It seems you have made it.

Hehe, good job, [px].
I knew you could nail it, [px].

Hey, don't get cocky.
Gosh, that's exactly why I hate humans...

Hehe, but you made it anyway.
Have faith in yourself.

But this is enhancement medicine, isn't it?
Is this the item that could take the dragon down!?

If so, I'd have told you that at the very start.
This is just the beginning.

This item serves another purpose...
To wake up the monster sealed deep in Fairyland.
Th-there lives such a monster in this Fairyland?

If we could take down that monster and get its horn,
we could make gear that could take down the dragon. But...

That monster is immensely powerful... We failed to
take it down even when we were young, so we had to seal it.

That's true... Humans, are you ready to wake up
and defeat such a powerful monster?
Yeah! After all, we need to defeat that dragon at last!

Hehe, we are counting on you.
I'm sure you'll be fine.

If anything happens, Lord Thunbergia will take care of it.
So, no worries, OK? â™ª
What!? Cuphea, don't decide for me...

Hehe... Alright, everyone.
Please be careful!

Thank you, your Majesty! Thank you, Lady Cuphea!
Off we go!
